text:
Is it possible to download e-book from Thank you page automatically?

This is what I am trying to achive. I have CTA "Download Brochure" in email template. When user click on it, it goes to "Thank You" page, now I want to have pdf downloaded automatically.

Is this possible in Thank you page?

I am trying with javascript click event but it's not working.
Hi <@U9KA594Q3>! Thanks for the response. I came to that conclusion as well. It is possible through the SMTP API tho.
But we can not use a HubSpot template

Most browsers will actively try to prevent that because that would be a significant security issue if a website could force you to download something without interaction.

There are likely work-arounds but your best bet is to require a click to initiate the download. It’s sure to keep working over time and it matches user’s expectations.
